Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: From the reports of these reputable people it would seem like the upcoming Australian Federal Budget is going to go big. Measures to combat the vaping epidemic a bonus scheme for the Australian Defence Force and an increase in JobSeeker payments are just some of the highlights that will benefit Australians. Also a monetary policy announcement from the Reserve Bank of Australia is generating attention while collaboration between contractors and policymakers has been recognized as crucial in the development of South Australia. Stay tuned for more updates on these exciting developments as they unravel.
